import React from 'react' import { NavLink, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useAuth } from '../context/auth'; import toast from "react-hot-toast"; import useCategory from '../hooks/useCategory'; function Header() { const [auth, setAuth] = useAuth(); const handleLogout = () => { setAuth({ ...auth, user: null, token: "", }); localStorage.removeItem("auth"); toast.success("Logout Successfully"); }; return (
Navbar
  • Home
  • Categories
    • All Categories
      • {categories?.map((c) => (
    • {c.name}
      • ))}
  • Register
  • Login
  • Logout
  • Cart(0)

) } export default Header
